comment.author: 82862615@N00
comment._content: Louis Tewanima (born 1888 - died January 18, 1969) was a Hopi Indian Track team member. Competed in 1908 (London) and 1912 (Stockholm) Olympics where he won the Silver medal in the 10K event. As best I can tell the caption on the trophy reads: Championship of the United States ????? ?Monfeld Marathon 1911 ? anniversary ? Trophy
